verses.verse: Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5375>went<s%> on his <S%H7272>journey,<s%> and <S%H1980>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

And he <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> were <S%H7257>lying<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> it, for from that <S%H875>well<s%> they <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks.<s%> Now the <S%H68>stone<s%> on the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H875>well<s%> was <S%H1419>large.<s%>

When <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> they would then <S%H1556>roll<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H875>well,<s%> and <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7725>put<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> in its <S%H4725>place<s%> on the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H875>well.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "My <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H370>where<s%> are you from?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We are from <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>"
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H3045>know<s%> [him.]"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with him?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H7965>well,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> is <S%H935>coming<s%> with the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> it is <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> it is not <S%H6256>time<s%> for the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> to be <S%H622>gathered.<s%> <S%H8248>Water<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H7462>pasture<s%> them."

But they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We <S%H3201>cannot,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> are <S%H622>gathered,<s%> and they <S%H1556>roll<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H875>well;<s%> then we <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>"
While he was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with them, <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with her father's <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> for she was a <S%H7462>shepherdess.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H9201>when<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his mother's <S%H251>brother,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his mother's <S%H251>brother,<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5066>went<s%> up, and <S%H1556>rolled<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H875>well,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> his mother's <S%H251>brother.<s%>
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> that he was a <S%H251>relative<s%> of her father and that he was Rebekah's <S%H1>son,<s%> and she <S%H1121>ran<s%> and <S%H7323>told<s%> her father.

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>news<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his sister's <S%H1121>son,<s%> that he <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him, and <S%H2263>embraced<s%> him and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to his <S%H1004>house.<s%> Then he <S%H5608>related<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H389>"Surely<s%> you are my <S%H6106>bone<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>" And he <S%H3427>stayed<s%> with him a <S%H2320>month.<s%>

Then <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> you are my <S%H251>relative,<s%> should you therefore <S%H5647>serve<s%> me for <S%H2600>nothing<s%>? <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, <S%H4100>what<s%> shall your <S%H4909>wages<s%> be?"

Now <S%H3837>Laban<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>older<s%> was <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H6996>younger<s%> was <S%H7354>Rachel.<s%>
And Leah's <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H7390>weak,<s%> but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> was <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> of <S%H8389>form<s%> and <S%H4758>face.<s%>

Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> so he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5647>serve<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel.<s%>"

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H2896>better<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> her to you <S%H4480>than<s%> that I should <S%H5414>give<s%> her to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> <S%H3427>stay<s%> with me."

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and they <S%H1961>seemed<s%> <S%H5869><s%> to him but a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> because of his <S%H160>love<s%> for her.
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> [me] my <S%H802>wife,<s%> for my <S%H3117>time<s%> is <S%H4390>completed,<s%> that I may <S%H935>go<s%> in to her."
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> that he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her to him; and [Jacob] <S%H935>went<s%> in to her.
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> also <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%> as a <S%H8198>maid.<s%>

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H3812>Leah!<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to me? Was it not for <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> that I <S%H5647>served<s%> with you? <S%H4100>Why<s%> then have you <S%H7411>deceived<s%> me?"

But <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is not the <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H3651><s%> in our <S%H4725>place,<s%> to <S%H5414>marry<s%> <S%H5414>off<s%> the <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the first-born.

<S%H4390>"Complete<s%> the <S%H7620>week<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>one,<s%> and we will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> with me for <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>"

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> and <S%H4390>completed<s%> her <S%H7620>week,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> as his <S%H802>wife.<s%>
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> also <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> as her <S%H8198>maid.<s%>

So [Jacob] <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and <S%H1571>indeed<s%> he <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> and he <S%H5647>served<s%> with Laban for <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H3812>Leah<s%> was <S%H8130>unloved,<s%> and He <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H7358>womb,<s%> but <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> was <S%H6135>barren.<s%>

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> for she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction;<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> will <S%H157>love<s%> me."

Then she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> that I am <S%H8130>unloved,<s%> He has therefore <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H2088>this<s%> [son] <S%H1571>also.<s%>" So she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%>

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> <S%H6471>this<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> will <S%H3867>become<s%> <S%H3867>attached<s%> to me, <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H3205>borne<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he was <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6471>"This<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> Then she <S%H5975>stopped<s%> <S%H3205>bearing.<s%>
